a203693020.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Roll out half of pastry to line pie pan, and roll out other half to cut into strips for lattice top.
In a medium mixing bowl combine eggs, sugar, flour, salt, lemon juice, and grated lemon rind.
Mix well then stir in pineapple.
Spread filling into pastry-lined pie pan, make lattice top, and crimp edges.
Place in preheated oven and bake 40 minutes or until filling is set and crust is lightly browned.
Chill before serving.

df9193a49e.gt:
In a large pot, heat 1 tablespoons of the oil on high heat.
When hot, add the pork cubes and cook until soft.
Stir in the garlic, curry powder, coriander, cumin, and crushed red pepper.
Cook 1 minute.
Add ginger, cinnamon, bay leaf, salt, chicken broth, and tomato paste.
Bring liquid to a boil, cover and simmer on low for 45 minutes.
Add peanut butter and blend well.
Cook stew another 3 minutes, uncovered to blend.
Stir in chopped tomato and bell pepper.
Simmer 2-3 minutes, just until the vegetables soften but still retain shape.
Before serving, taste to correct seasonings; You may wish to add a final splash of lemon juice to refresh the flavors.
df9193a49e.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large pot, saute pork in oil until browned.
Add onions, peppers, and garlic and saute until soft.
Add tomatoes, peanut butter, and seasonings.
Add water and bring to a boil.
Cover and bake for 1 hour.
Serve over rice.

fcf4d62dec.gt:
Measure the sugar and 1 tablespoon of water, and put into a pan.
You don't have to dissolve the sugar.
Measure out the water you will add later, and prepare in a cup.
Start heating over a medium-high heat.
It will gradually bubble up.
Keep watching it, and you'll see it starting to brown from the edges.
When all of the syrup has browned, turn off the heat.
It will keep cooking and the flavor will continue to deepen, so watch out!
If you like bitter caramel wait for a while before adding the water.
If you prefer less bitter caramel or you're serving this to little kiddies, add the water immediately.
It will splatter, so be careful.
Shake the pan to even out the consistency of the mixture.
If you added too much water, put the pan back on the heat to evaporate some.
Pour the caramel sauce into flan or pudding cups while it's still hot.
If you don't add it right away, it will harden!
Swirl the cups around so that the sauce is evenly distributed.
When the surface of the sauce hardens and no longer sticks to your fingers when you touch it, add the flan mixture and get going!
fcf4d62dec.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Mix together sugar and water in a saucepan.
Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly.
Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat and add butter.
Stir until butter is melted.
Pour into a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven and let cool.
Serve over custard flans.

88803603ec.gt:
Place sardines in 11 x 7 x 2-inch glass baking dish.
Sprinkle fish with 1 teaspoon coarse salt.
Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, prepare barbecue (medium-high heat).
Combine cilantro, parsley, and lemon peel in small bowl.
Mix olives and onion in another small bowl.
Brush sardines lightly with oil.
Sprinkle half of herb mixture over sardines; turn to coat.
Grill sardines until just opaque in center, 1 to 2 minutes per side, depending on size.
Arrange sardines on platter.
Sprinkle with olive mixture, then remaining herb mixture.
Sprinkle with freshly ground black pepper.
Garnish with lemon wedges.
88803603ec.pred:

e4f1c20d6c.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F
Beat egg yolks thoroughly with salt and paprika.
Beat in oil a little at a time.
Beat in butter a little at a time.
Stir in 3/4 of the cheese.
Combine with spinach.
Pour one third of spinach mixture into a greased shallow 9" square baking dish.
Season both sides of fish with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Roll fish up and place rolls, loose side down, in pan on top of spinach.
Top with remaining spinach mixture.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Bake for 20 minutes.
e4f1c20d6c.pred:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Cut fillets into 2-inch pieces.
Place fillets on a baking sheet.
Season fillets with salt and pepper.
Bake for 10 minutes.
Serve with lemon wedges.

5a22f9a832.gt:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Grease an 8-inch square baking dish.
Combine ground beef, rolled oats, French onion soup, and eggs in a bowl until thoroughly combined; transfer to prepared baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until the meat loaf is no longer pink in the middle and an instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the center of the loaf reads at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), 60 to 75 minutes.
5a22f9a832.pred:
Combine ground beef, onion, egg, bread crumbs, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, salt, pepper, and garlic.
Shape into a loaf and place in a greased loaf pan.
Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour.
Serve with mashed potatoes and steamed broccoli.

7d71040d61.gt:
In a skillet, cook the spinach, stirring, until wilted; transfer to a colander and squeeze dry.
Finely chop the spinach.
In a bowl, combine 1 1/2 teaspoons of the soy sauce, the sesame oil, sherry, salt, sugar and white pepper.
Mix in the pork, scallion, ginger and spinach.
Chill for 10 minutes.
Dust a large baking sheet with cornstarch.
Arrange 4 wonton wrappers on a work surface, keeping the other wrappers covered with plastic wrap.
Brush the edges of the wrappers with water and spoon 1 teaspoon of filling in the center of each.
Fold the wrappers diagonally over the filling to form triangles; seal.
Bring the two opposite corners of the triangle together; press to seal.
Transfer to the baking sheet and cover.
Repeat.
In a large saucepan of boiling water, simmer the wontons over moderate heat, stirring occasionally.
When they float, cook for 3 minutes longer.
Drain the wontons well.
In a large bowl, combine the remaining soy sauce with the chile oil, peanut oil and garlic.
Add the wontons and toss.
Sprinkle with the cilantro and serve.
7d71040d61.pred:
Spinach, Pork, Wonton Wrappers, and Eggs.
.
.
.

10dc73989c.gt:
Cook pasta as directed on package, omitting salt.
Meanwhile, heat large skillet on medium-high heat.
Add shrimp, tomatoes and cream cheese spread; cook and stir 3 to 4 min.
or until cream cheese is melted and shrimp are done.
Drain pasta; place in large bowl.
Add spinach and shrimp mixture; mix lightly.

de0b779581.gt:
In 2-cup glass measuring cup, combine chicken broth and enough water to equal 2 cups.
In 2-quart saucepan, heat broth mixture, thyme, and nutmeg to boiling over high heat.
Add bulgur, reduce heat to medium-low.
Cover and simmer 10 to 15 minutes until liquid is absorbed.
Garnish each serving with a thyme sprig.
de0b779581.pred:
Rinse bulgur under cold water until the water runs clear.
Drain well.
In a medium saucepan, combine bulgur, 2 cups water, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the water is absorbed and the bulgur is tender.
Fluff with a fork.
In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil over medium heat.
Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add rice and cook, stirring constantly, until rice is translucent and beginning to brown, about 5 minutes.
Add 1 cup water and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 15 minutes, or until the water is absorbed and the rice is tender.
Fluff with a fork.
Stir in parsley and serve.

55c9dcc2b4.gt:
Cut each cake roll into eight slices; set aside any chocolate coating that separates from rolls for garnish.
Line a 9-inch springform pan with cake slices so that the swirl of cream and chocolate is on it's side and can be seen when you take the springform pan off, completely covering the bottom and sides.
In a small bowl, whisk milk and pudding mixes for 2 minutes.
Let stand for 2 minutes or until soft-set.
Pour over cake.
Spread with whipped topping; sprinkle with any reserved chocolate coating.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
**Cook time does not include refrigeration time of two hours.

e03a36dd25.gt:
Place popcorn kernels in paper bag.
Fold the top of the bag 3 times.
Place in microwave.
Set time for 40 to 60 seconds.
(this will vary depending on your microwave, Mine takes 3 minutes total)
When popping has stopped pour popcorn in a bowl and finish popping any unpopped kernels for 15 to 20 seconds (depending on your microwave).
Add rest of popcorn to bowl, when done.
Salt popcorn to your taste and enjoy!
Note: Add melted butter and/or other seasonings over top of popcorn and stir well to distribute butter and seasonings.
e03a36dd25.pred:
Preheat oven to 250 degrees F.
Line a large baking sheet with aluminum foil.
Pour popcorn kernels into a paper grocery bag.
Close the bag and shake to coat the kernels with oil.
Place the bag on the baking sheet and place in the oven.
Bake for 30 minutes, shaking the bag every 10 minutes.
Remove from oven and place on a cooling rack.
Allow to cool completely.
Store in an airtight container.

6febef31e3.gt:
Pour the water in a saucepan and heat it until medium hot.
Mix the cocoa powder with the water.
Add in Splenda and mix until the mixture becomes creamy and thick.
Do not add too much Splenda as biscuits themselves are the major source of sweetness in the recipe.
Crush the biscuits separately in a bowl.
Make sure the pieces are neither too big nor extremely powdery.
We just need small pieces.
Add the cocoa mixture to the bowl and mix it lightly with a spoon.
Take a small plastic bag and put in the resulting mixture, roll the plastic bag in a cylinder like shape.
Put the bag in a Refrigerator and allow it to cool for 4-6 hours.
6febef31e3.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Mix together the dry ingredients in a large bowl.
Add the wet ingredients and mix until combined.
Pour into a greased 9x13 pan.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool completely before cutting into squares.
Serve with a dollop of sugar free whipped cream.

35d5f29f3c.gt:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Meanwhile, saute onion in the olive oil, along with the dried basil.
Saute over medium heat and stir frequently so the basil does not burn.
Cook until onions are tender and translucent.
Add salt to taste.
When pasta is done, drain and add onion basil mixture.
Add cheese and toss to coat.
Serve warm.
Add salt to taste if needed.
35d5f29f3c.pred:
Whole wheat pasta, basil, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper, and Parmesan cheese.
.
.
.

08a07f6ff5.gt:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Add the rye, Licor 43, lemon juice and egg white and shake vigorously.
Strain into an ice-filled highball glass and top with half of the club soda.
Wait a moment for the drink to froth, then top with the remaining club soda.
08a07f6ff5.pred:
Combine the flavors of a classic silver lining dish with the freshness of a green salad.
In a large skillet, saute onions, garlic, and mushrooms.
Add a splash of olive oil and cook for 5 minutes.
Add the chicken and cook for 5 more minutes.
Add the spinach and cook until wilted.
Add the tomatoes and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the cream and cook for 1 minute.
Add the cheese and cook until melted.
Serve over a bed of lettuce.

1c75a448ec.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Combine all ingredients except flour and walnuts in a mixing bowl.
Mix well.
Gradually add flour until well mixed.
Add walnuts.
You can substitute any nut you prefer.
Variation: I have occasionally omitted the nuts for chocolate chips - or used both.
I would almost say they are better than the toll house recipe.
Bake cookies for about 12 minutes on a cookie sheet.
Enjoy!
1c75a448ec.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in the egg and vanilla.
In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, brown sugar, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, mixing until just combined.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop the dough by rounded teaspoonfuls onto a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, until the edges are golden brown.
Remove from the oven and let cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

b69844d37b.gt:
Chill 4 Martini glasses in freezer 30 minutes.
Combine all liquors in cocktail shaker; add ice cubes and shake to chill.
Strain mixture into cold glasses.
Garnish each with orange peel strip.
b69844d37b.pred:
Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

a89ec9f9d3.gt:
* See my TastyKitchen recipe box for my Fail-Proof Pizza Dough recipe, if interested.
Preheat oven to 500 degrees F with a pizza stone inside.
If you dont have a pizza stone, use an upside down cookie sheet.
Mix butter and garlic in a small bowl and set aside.
Spread pizza dough out into a 12-inch circle on parchment paper.
(This makes it easier to transfer the dough to the pizza stone.)
Spread the butter and garlic mixture over dough and top with parmesan and mozzarella cheeses.
Top with a light sprinkling of salt and pepper, if desired.
(That step is totally optional!)
Transfer the dough to the preheated stone or pan.
Bake 9-10 minutes or until bubbly and golden.
Remove from oven and cool 1-2 minutes before cutting.
Serve hot, with marinara.
a89ec9f9d3.pred:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
Combine 1 cup of flour, 1/2 cup of water, and 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a bowl.
Knead until dough is smooth and elastic.
Cover with plastic wrap and let rest for 30 minutes.
Divide dough into 8 equal pieces.
Roll each piece into a rope about 1/2 inch in diameter.
Cut each rope into 4 pieces.
Place pieces on a baking sheet.
Bake for 15 minutes, until golden brown.
Remove from oven and brush with garlic butter.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Return to oven and bake for 5 minutes, until cheese is melted.

865f667783.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Mix together ground beef, chestnuts, soy sauce, brown sugar, onion powder, and garlic powder thoroughly in a large bowl.
Form the mixture into 2 tablespoon-sized balls, and place onto a baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 15 minutes.
Stir together the apricot preserves and the cider vinegar, toss with meatballs in a clean bowl, then return to baking sheet, and bake for an additional 5 minutes.
865f667783.pred:
Brown sugar, soy sauce, pineapple, and onions.
.
.
.

d1c9619b01.gt:
Mix and bake cake according to the package
In a large bowl combine and mix the evaporated, condensed and heavy cream...
When the cake is at room temperature pour the milks over the cake...slowly letting the cake absorb the milk...let it rest in the fridge for 2 to 4 hours and then frost the cake with the cool whip frosting and top it off with the cinammon and sprinkles...
Enjoy!!
!
d1c9619b01.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine the cake mix, milk, and eggs.
Beat with an electric mixer on low speed until moistened.
Pour into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake for 30 to 35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool in the pan for 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely.
In a medium bowl, combine the evaporated milk, condensed milk, and heavy cream.
Beat with an electric mixer on low speed until smooth.
Pour over the cooled cake.
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.
Before serving, top with whipped cream and garnish with fruit.

449991b9b4.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix first 9 ingredients in large bowl until well blended.
Fill pepper halves with sausage mixture, dividing equally and mounding slightly.
Arrange in 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
(Can be made 1 day ahead.
Cover; chill.)
Bake peppers uncovered until tops are browned and thermometer inserted into filling registers 165F, about 1 hour.
Transfer peppers to platter.
Garnish with rosemary sprigs and serve.
449991b9b4.pred:
Stuffed Peppers: Stuff peppers with rice, meat, and vegetables.
Rice: Brown rice.
Meat: Ground beef.
Vegetables: Onions, tomatoes, peppers, and spinach.
Spices: Salt, pepper, and cumin.
Oil: Olive oil.
Water: 1 1/2 cups.
Salt: 1/2 teaspoon.
Pepper: 1/2 teaspoon.
Bread crumbs: 1/2 cup.
Eggs: 2.
Brown sugar: 1/4 cup.
Sour cream: 1/4 cup.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Place peppers in a large pot and cover with water.
Bring to a boil and cook for 5 minutes.
Drain and rinse peppers under cold water.
Slice onions, tomatoes, peppers, and spinach.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add onions, tomatoes, peppers, and spinach.
Cook until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
Add salt, pepper, and cumin.
Stir in rice and meat.
Cook until meat is no longer pink, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in sour cream and brown sugar.
Spoon mixture into peppers.
Sprinkle with bread crumbs and top with eggs.
Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes.

0ca9bd3da2.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.To prepare aioli, combine first 5 ingredients in a small bowl; set aside.To prepare crab cakes, combine bell pepper and next 7 ingredients (through black pepper) in a large bowl; stir well with a whisk.
Add panko and crabmeat; toss gently.
Divide the crab mixture into 12 equal portions, shaping each into a 1-inch-thick patty.Heat oil in a large ovenproof skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat.
Add patties; cook 2 minutes.
Carefully turn patties over.
Place pan in oven; bake at 350 for 6 minutes.

Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a medium bowl, combine the crab, onion, bell pepper, bread crumbs, egg, parsley, and salt and pepper.
Form into 1-inch balls and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 15 minutes, or until golden brown.
Serve with Herbed Aioli.

c651774003.gt:
Wrap each banana slice with a piece of bacon.
Fry wrapped banana in a skillet until bacon is desired crispness, 15 to 30 minutes.
Remove wrapped bananas from skillet with a toothpick and place on a serving dish.

Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Cut bacon into 1/4-inch strips.
Wrap each banana in a strip of bacon.
Place the wrapped bananas on a baking sheet.

Serve warm.

59de26d69e.gt:
Saute onions and celery
Add chicken powder & 4 cups of water add chicken pieces (wingdings) & cook on med high for 45mins
Add cream of chicken let cook for another 30 mins
Cook rice as it states on the box
Place rice on plate top with chicken and enjoy
59de26d69e.pred:
Chicken with rice & gravy is a popular dish that can be made in a variety of ways.
In this recipe, we will be using chicken, rice, and a gravy made from the drippings of the chicken.
The chicken can be either baked, grilled or fried.
The rice can be cooked in a rice cooker, on the stove top, or in the oven.
The gravy is made by simmering the drippings from the chicken in a pan with flour and adding stock.
You can also use a blender to make the gravy.
Once the chicken is cooked, remove it from the pan and place it on a plate.
Then add the rice to the pan and stir to combine.
Pour the gravy over the rice and chicken and serve.

e4e4b2152e.gt:
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
Add 3/4 can water to soup.
Heat.
Mix 3/4 can water with flour.
Stir into soup.
Cook, stirring until it thickens.
Add tuna.
Pour into a baking dish.
Mix Bisquick with milk.
Roll into an 8x10 rectangle.
Spread with cheese and pimiento.
Roll like a jelly roll.
Cut into 12 slices.
Place on the tuna mixture.
Bake for 15 minutes.

Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Cut up tuna into bite-sized pieces.
Mix together tuna, bread crumbs, onion, egg, salt, pepper, and parsley.
Form into patties.
Place patties on a baking sheet.
Bake for 20 minutes.

01eb818f49.gt:
Cook the chicken breast pieces in the water in a large pot over high heat until done (170 degrees).
Remove the chicken pieces to plate and cover with plastic wrap; set aside.
Pour the dried pasta in to the same boiling water and cook until tender, about 6 minutes.
Drain in a colander; set aside.
Place the Greek yogurt, the Hidden Valley Original Ranch Seasoning Mix, the reserved marinating juice from the artichoke hearts, Parmesan cheese, the zest and juice of the lemon, white pepper, curry and cayenne powders in a small sized bowl and whisk until well blended and smooth.

Mix until all is evenly coated.

01eb818f49.pred:
Chicken, pasta, salad dressing, and vegetables.
Chicken Pasta Salad:
In a large bowl, mix chicken, cooked pasta, and vegetables.
Add dressing and mix well.
Serve immediately.

22df25b9dd.gt:
Heat oven to 350F.
Mix baking crumbs and butter; press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan.
Beat cream cheese and granulated sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended.
Add chocolate and liqueur; mix well.
Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each addition just until blended.
Pour over crust.
Bake 45 to 50 min.
or until centre is almost set.
Run knife around rim of pan to loosen cake; cool before removing rim.
Refrigerate cheesecake 4 hours.
Sprinkle icing sugar over cheesecake just before serving.
Top with berries.

Preheat oven to 325 degrees F.
In a large bowl, mix together cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla.
Add eggs and mix well.
Add chocolate and mix until smooth.
Pour into a 9-inch springform pan.
Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Remove from oven and let cool.
Refrigerate overnight.

f0e77c97c6.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Brown onion, garlic and ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat for about 4 minutes.
Add red pepper flakes and continue cooking until the ground beef is fully cooked.

Drain extra fat out of the skillet then stir in drained sauerkraut and Worcestershire.
Heat through and set aside.
Press 1 package of crescent roll dough into the bottom of a lightly greased 9x13-inch baking dish.
Spread beef mixture on top and cover with cheese.
Lay second package of crescent roll dough over the top of the beef and cheese mixture.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
f0e77c97c6.pred:
Mix all ingredients together.
Place in a baking dish.
Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.

93479dc342.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees.
In a large mixing bowl, cream sugar, shortening, and salt.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
Add extract and mix well.
In a separate bowl, sift flour and baking powder.
Add milk to creamed mixture.
Add flour mixture to creamed mixture.
Fold in coconut.
Bake in a greased and floured bundt pan for 1 hour.
About 10 minutes before cake is done, combine sugar, extract and water in a small saucepen.
Bring to a boil and boil one minute.
Pour over cake immediately after removing cake from the oven.
Let cake sit 30 minutes before removing from pan.
93479dc342.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Add the eggs, milk, coconut, and vanilla extract.
Beat with an electric mixer until well blended.
Pour into a greased 9x13 inch baking pan.
Bake for 30 to 35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

18c37b1d2b.pred:
Peanut butter, bananas, and honey.
Peanut butter, bananas, and honey are the core ingredients for this Sugar Free Peanut Butter Delight.
To make the dish, start by spreading peanut butter on a banana.
Then, top the banana with honey.
Enjoy!

9bde591cc5.gt:
In a large skillet, brown the ground meat and drain off any grease.
Add the chopped onion and cook for about 3 minutes, until the onions are softened.
Add the cabbage and water and cook for about 5 minutes, or until the cabbage starts to wilt.
Add the tomatoes, brown sugar, vinegar, salt, caraway seed and garlic.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and cover.

In a large bowl, mix together cooked rice, cabbage, and carrots.

e1cc65aa99.gt:
Grease 9 x 13 inch pan.
Heat syrup, butter and morsels to boiling stirring constantly.
Remove from heat, stir in vanilla.
Pour over cereal in bowl, toss until coated.
Fold in marshmallows 1 cup at a time.
Press into pan with buttered back of spoon.
Let stand 1 hour.
Cut into 2 inch squares.
Store at room temperature.

In a large bowl, mix together graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, and sugar.
Press mixture evenly into the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.

Remove from oven and spread marshmallows over crust.
Bake for 3 minutes.
Remove from oven and spread chocolate over marshmallows.

f3de3243b2.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Cut twelve 1/2 slices on the diagonal from the baguette.
Lay them out on a baking sheet and lightly brush the tops with olive oil and sprinkle with black pepper.
Bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden-brown.
When done remove the pan from the oven and set it aside.
Meanwhile, cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy.
When done, set bacon aside on a paper towel-lined plate.
Very thinly slice the brie and set aside.
Cut the peaches in half and remove the pit.
Lay the halves flat-side down and cut into 1/4 thick slices.
Heat a grill pan over medium-high and lightly coat with cooking spray.
Grill the peaches for no more than 60 seconds on each side, brushing lightly with balsamic vinegar.
Place a piece of brie on each crostini, followed by half a piece of bacon and a peach slice.
Arrange them on a platter, sprinkle with chopped basil, and serve.
Makes 12 crostini.
f3de3243b2.pred:
Peach, Bacon, Brie, and Crostini.
Peel and slice peaches.
Cut bacon into small pieces.
Cut Brie into small cubes.
Place peaches on crostini.
Top with bacon.
Drizzle with honey.
Serve immediately.

4c06a6e6ee.gt:
Mix the sugar and Boric Acic well.
Add the warm water slowly, mixing all the while so it won't be too lumpy.
Store in a jar.
When ready to use, put cotton into the top of a jar lid to fill it, and then saturate the cotton to the top.
Place where you want it; make several if you need it.
Will keep for a long while.
NOTE: I usually drip a drop or two over the edge of the lid to rest on the counter so they will find it sooner.
It sometimes takes a little while for them to find it, but find it they will.
When they do, let them alone; you will want to kill them because they look so creepy; but don't because they will hang over the edge of the lid and drink, drink, drink, and then take it back to the nest.
Almost over night, they will be gone.
4c06a6e6ee.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a bowl, mix together 1/2 cup of sugar and 1/2 cup of water.
Stir until the sugar is completely dissolved.
Add 1/2 teaspoon of baking soda and 1/2 teaspoon of cream of tartar.
Stir until the mixture is foamy.
Pour the mixture into a spray bottle.
Spray the mixture onto the areas where ants are present.
Allow the mixture to sit for 15 minutes.
Vacuum up the dead ants.
Repeat the process until the ants are gone.

Grind pecans in the food processor; add to cookie crumbs.

Spread coconut onto a plate and 1/4 cup confectioners' sugar onto a separate plate.
Roll balls in coconut and sugar to coat.
Arrange balls onto a platter, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until hardened, at least 1 hour.
7b189a7aea.pred:
Mix all ingredients together and chill.
Chill the dough for at least 2 hours.
Roll into 1-inch balls.
Place on a greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350 degrees for 10-12 minutes.

b379bad205.gt:
Place potato and 3 tbs water in a small bowl.
Cover with plastic wrap, vent and microwave 4 minutes or until tender, stirring once.
Set aside.
Heat a 10" skillet over med-high heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray and add onion.
Cover and cook 10 minutes or until lightly browned, stirring occasionally.
Uncover and cook 10 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently.
While onions cook, add 1/3 cup water, 1 Tbs at a time to prevent sticking.
Stir in potato, sage, salt and pepper.
Spoon into bowl and cool.
Combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg whites and eggs in a bowl.
Add egg mixture to potato mixture and stir well.
Preheat broiler.
Pour mixture into skillet coated with cooking spray.
Cook over medium heat for 7 minutes or until bottom of frittata is browned and top is almost set.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on top and broil for 5 minutes or until cheese melts and top is set.

625c3e8493.gt:
Add coarsely chopped or halved cherries to a large pot.
Add lemon juice, cherry Kirsch, and vanilla extract and bring the mixture to a slow boil over medium-high heat.
In a bowl, whisk together cocoa powder and 2 cups of sugar until it is evenly distributed and there are no clumps.
Add the cocoa/sugar mixture to the cherries.
Add the remaining sugar.
Bring the mixture back up to a boil.
Stir in the butter and reduce the heat to medium.
Simmer for 1215 minutes, stirring often, until the sugar has completely dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly.
The sauce will thicken further once it cools.
To can and store the Black Forest Sundae Sauce: Ladle hot sundae sauce into sterilized half pint jars, leaving 1/4 headspace.
Wipe jar rims and add lids.
Process jars in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes.
Remove the jars and cool on wire racks.
Store in a cool, dark place.
Store any opened jars in the refrigerator.

combine first 5 ingredients in large bowl -- make well in center.
combine egg, milk and oil, stir well.
add to dry ingredients, just till moistened --
combine blueberries, 1 tbls flour and 1 tbls sugar, toss gently to coat.
fold into batter.
spoon batter into 6 greased jumbo muffin cups, 2/3 rds full --

bake at 400* for 20 minutes or golden.
remove from pan to wire rack immediately.

c3b113f071.gt:
Cook bacon and set aside.
Fry beef with mushrooms and salt and pepper (or seasoning of your choice).
Unroll crescent triangles on baking sheet.
Add a thick slice of cheese, bacon, beef mixture and green onions to each triangle and roll up.
Place a thin piece of cheese on top of roll.
Cook stuffed crescent rolls as per the package instructions and ENJOY!
!
c3b113f071.pred:
Preheat oven to 200C.
Cut beef into small pieces and cook in a frying pan until browned.
Add onion and cook until soft.
Add bacon and cook until crispy.
Spread out the beef mixture on a piece of foil.
Place a slice of cheese on top of the beef.
Roll up the foil into a cylinder.
Wrap the cylinder in aluminum foil and place in the oven for 10 minutes.
Remove from oven and slice into 1-inch pieces.

337c3e4209.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees.
Wash potatoes and leave the skins on.
Cut into large, equal-sized chunks, and place them in a large mixing bowl.
Slice the onion thickly, separate and place them in the bowl as well.
Add all of your dry ingredients, along with the olive oil, and give it a good mix to evenly distribute everything together.
Cut each sausage link into thirds and place in the bowl with the potatoes and onions.
From here, I mix this all together with my hands.
Gently mix the sausage into the potato and onion mixture, trying not to break apart the sausage as you do this.
Dump this all into a 13 x 9 baking dish and cover with aluminum foil.
Place in the oven and allow this to cook for a minimum of one hour.
After an hour, turn the oven up to 400 degrees, remove the foil and place back in the oven until the sausage is nicely brown.
Stir every few minutes so all the sausage gets some equal browning space.
This can take anywhere from 15 to 30 minutes to achieve.
Make sure you watch this closely after returning to the oven so your potatoes and sausage dont burn.
Notes: I used light tasting olive oil, which is my preference.
If you prefer a stronger tasting oil, like extra virgin olive oil, feel free to use it.
While I normally cook with fresh, chopped garlic, I dont use it in this recipe, and substitute the garlic powder.
Fresh garlic tends to pool in the bottom of the dish, or on the top, and burns when browning the sausage.

11e9299476.gt:
Preheat the oven according the directions for the biscuits.
Have the biscuits ready to put in oven
Start cooking the Sausage.
Once cook drain out the oil that's in the pan
Leave sausage in pan.
Add the flour and the milk.
Put heat to high and continue to mix.
Don't stop mixing until the gravy starts to boil.
Once its boiling, lower down heat to simmer for 5min.
Don't touch for those 5min.
Now put in the biscuits in the oven
Once the 5min is up give the gravy a little mix and set aside to cool down.
The longer it sits outside the thicker it would get.
When the biscuits are ready open them up and pour the sausage gravy on top.
Enjoy.

ea0c63b401.gt:
In a medium saute pan, bring the stock to a boil.
Add the orzo and cook for 7 to 8 minutes until liquid is almost absorbed and orzo is tender.
Turn off heat.
Stir in the remaining ingredients.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.
Enjoy!
ea0c63b401.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine orzo, lemon pepper, and 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese.
Pour 1/2 cup of olive oil over the orzo mixture and toss to coat.
Spread the orzo mixture on a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove from oven and sprinkle with remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
Return to oven and bake for 5 minutes more.

c3ac924e63.gt:
Light a grill.
Shape the meat into 4 patties and season on both sides with salt and pepper.
Wrap each hamburger with 2 slices of pancetta.
Grill the burgers over a medium-hot fire for about 4 minutes, or until nicely browned on the bottom.
Flip the burgers and top them with the Gorgonzola.
Grill for about 4 minutes longer, or until nicely browned and cooked through.
Meanwhile, brush the cut sides of the buns with the butter and grill them, cut side down, until lightly toasted.
Set the burgers on the bun bottoms and top with the lettuce, tomato and onion.
Serve at once.
c3ac924e63.pred:
Heat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a large skillet, cook pancetta over medium heat until crisp.
Remove pancetta with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towels.
Discard all but 1 tablespoon of drippings.
Add ground beef to skillet and cook until no longer pink.
Drain.
Add onion and cook until soft.
Stir in Gorgonzola cheese and cook until melted.
Add bread crumbs and season with salt and pepper.
Stir until well combined.
Shape into 4 patties.
Place patties on a baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes.
Remove from oven and top each burger with 1 tablespoon of pancetta.
Return to oven and bake for 2 minutes.
Serve on buns.

ffcb21a60b.gt:
In a pot combine vegetable broth and milk and bring to a boil.
turn off heat, stir in polenta and cook until thickened (abut 3-5 minutes).
Set aside to thicken further.
Clean, wash and peel the carrots.
Slice lenghtwise.
Heat butter in a skillet and add carrots.
Saute for some minutes, then add 5 tbs of water and cook covered on medium heat for another ten minutes until soft.
Season with sugar, salt and pepper.
Add sour cream or yoghurt, sage and half of the cheese to the polenta and stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Pour into a casserole dish (about 20X12 cm) and top with the carrots (I used their liquid too since it was full of flavour, but that way the casserole may get a bit soggy).
Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake in the preheated oven at 200C (~400F) for 20 minutes.
Let stand for about 5 minutes until polenta has set and can be sliced.
ffcb21a60b.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, mix together the polenta, carrots, onion, garlic, salt, pepper, and eggs.
Pour into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake for 45 minutes, or until the polenta is firm and the top is golden brown.
Serve hot.

167bcf0a2a.gt:
FRIED SCRUMBLE EGGS
fried scrumble egg set aside
BAKE BACON
bake bacon on parchment paper at 200 C for 15 minute then set aside
SAUTE SPINACH
with oiled pan quick saute spinach for 1 minute with a dash of salt then set aside
FRIED GARLIC AND SHALLOT
fry garlic and shallot till fragrant then add light soy sauce and off heat then add fried eggs and bacon mix well
top on cooked spinach and serve immediately
167bcf0a2a.pred:
LG CRISPY BACON AND EGGS ON SPINACH:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Cut the bacon into small pieces and fry until crispy.
Remove the bacon from the pan and drain on paper towels.
Cook the spinach in a pan with a little bit of water until wilted.
In a medium sized bowl, whisk together the eggs, salt, and pepper.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Add the spinach to the pan and cook for 1 minute.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook until the eggs are set.
Top with the bacon and cook for 1 more minute.
Serve immediately.

73a84e1f5e.gt:
Wash and peel the zucchini and cut into long strips.
Season with salt and pepper.
Mix the eggs, milk and salt, dip the zucchini strips into the mixture and then roll in the breadcrumbs.
Saute until crisp on the outside but not overcooked, about 2-3 minutes.
Serve.
73a84e1f5e.pred:
Heat oven to 450 degrees F.
Cut zucchini into 1/2-inch slices.
Toss zucchini in olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Spread zucchini in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Roast for 15 minutes, until tender and lightly browned.
Remove from oven and set aside.
In a small bowl, mix together the egg yolk, Parmesan cheese, and bread crumbs.
Dip zucchini slices into egg mixture, then into bread crumbs.
Place on a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes, until golden brown.
Serve immediately.

6bf369490a.gt:
Stir boiling water into dry gelatin mix in large bowl at least 2 min.
until completely dissolved.
Drain pineapple, reserving juice.
Add enough ice to juice to measure 1-1/2 cups.
Add to gelatin; stir until ice is completely melted.
Refrigerate 45 min.
or until slightly thickened.
Remove 1-1/2 cups of the gelatin; place in medium bowl.
Stir in pineapple; set aside.
Add 1-1/2 cups of the whipped topping to remaining gelatin; stir with wire whisk until well blended.
Pour into 9-inch square dish.
Refrigerate 15 min.
or until set but not firm.
Carefully spoon fruited gelatin over creamy layer in dish.
Refrigerate at least 3 hours or until firm.
Cut into 9 squares.
Serve topped evenly with the remaining whipped topping.

Bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool completely before cutting into squares.

Cut potatoes lengthwise in half; place, cut sides down, on foil-covered rimmed baking sheet.

Scoop out centers of potatoes into bowl, leaving 1/4-inch-thick shells.

Fill shells with potato mixture; top with nuts.

oil in medium nonstick skillet on medium-high heat.

or until tender; transfer to bowl; set aside.
Meanwhile in small bowl, whisk eggs and pepper.
Heat remaining oil in skillet.
Add egg mixture; cook 2 to 3 min.
or until eggs are almost set, lifting edge with spatula and tilting skillet to allow uncooked portion to flow underneath.

Slide or flip onto serving plate; cut in half.

whipped cream, .

4a46bab1e9.gt:
Mix all ingredients together, I use my stand mixer with the dough hook.
Let mixer kneed the dough for about 5 minutes.
Dough should be moist and pliable but not sticky, if it is dry add more water, if it is too sticky add a little extra flour.
Coat a bowl with a little oil place dough in the bowl and cover with cling wrap and leave for about 1 hour or till doubled in size.
Once doubled in size dust bench lightly with flour turn out dough and lightly press down to remove a little of the air.
Form into your choice of loaf, I like to use a proofing basket, but you could use a tin or free form.
Let the loaf rise for another 40 min to 1 hour.
Pre heat your oven to super hot 450 F/ 250C.
I use a pizza stone but it can go straight in the oven on a tray if you don't have one.
Leave oven temp on high for 10 min then reduce to 375 F/ 190 C for a further 20 minute.
Enjoy!
4a46bab1e9.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
In a large bowl, mix together the yogurt, eggs, milk, and honey.
Add the flour, baking powder, and salt.
Mix well.
Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan.
Bake for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Allow the bread to cool for 10 minutes before removing from the pan.

3182df418c.pred:
Fresh watermelon, cucumber, tomato, red onion, jalapeno, lime juice, cilantro, and mint.

aacb2f290c.gt:
Preheat grill to medium high.
Drizzle oil and lemon juice over romaine and season with salt and pepper.
Place on grill and cook for 1-2 minutes per side.
Place cooked romaine on 2 plates and drizzle with dressing top with anchovies, cheese and or croutons.
Enjoy!

35f4aac182.gt:
Place rice into the bento, cover the whole surface with bonito flakes, and drizzle with a round of soy sauce.
Top it with shredded nori seaweed and roasted sesame.
The crackly texture and aroma of the baked seaweed is delicious.
Cover with lots of kettle-cooked shirasu.
Shred shiso leaves and scatter.
It smells great.
Top it with ginger to taste .
Grate a daikon radish, lightly squeezing out the excess water, mix with ponzu sauce in a small container to make grated ponzu sauce.
It tastes great to eat this with the grated ponzu sauce from Step 5.
In addition to the bento: Misakiko fried tuna katsu, Kanagawa komatsuna and daikon radish, aburaage stir-fry, Odawara fish paste with shiso leaves and pickled plums, imitation crab meat fried eggs, and tomatoes and shiso leaves.
Try eating the fried tuna katsu with lots of grated daikon and ponzu sauce from Step 5 ..
35f4aac182.pred:
Shonan, Kanagawa is famous for its fresh seafood, so I have chosen shirasu, a small fish, as the main ingredient.
I have also added ingredients such as shiso, a leafy green herb, and bonito flakes, a Japanese ingredient.
The rice is kettle-cooked, so it is fluffy and delicious.
I have also used a bento box to serve this dish.
Here is the recipe for the kettle-cooked shirasu rice bowl bento:
Ingredients:
1 cup shirasu (small fish)
1/2 cup shiso leaves
1/2 cup bonito flakes
1 cup rice
1 cup water
1 tablespoon salt
1 tablespoon sugar
1 tablespoon soy sauce
1 teaspoon sesame oil
1 teaspoon sake
1 teaspoon mirin
1 teaspoon shichimi (Japanese seven-spice)
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon sugar
1/2 teaspoon soy sauce
1/2 teaspoon sesame oil
1/2 teaspoon sake

6f3b4ebeac.gt:
Cut the apple/pear and ginger into fine pieces.
Thinly slice the chili.
Mix chili, ginger, syrup, cinnamon, orange juice and zest in a saucepan and heat until it is boiling.
Add the apples/pears and bring to a boil again.
Add walnuts and raisins, and boil for about 5 minutes.
Pour into a glass with a tight fitting lid and cool completely.
(It will thicken up a bit when cooled down.)
Store in the fridge for a few weeks.
Serve with home baked baguettes, artisan bread and lots of wonderful cheeses.
Yum!
Enjoy!
6f3b4ebeac.pred:
Mix the apples, ginger, walnuts and raisins in a large bowl.
Mix well.
Add in the sugar and spices.
Mix well.
Add in the vinegar and mix well.
Let sit for 10 minutes.
Serve.

4816a33066.gt:
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering.
Add onion and salt and stir until coated with oil.
Reduce heat to medium, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is soft, about 10 minutes (if onion begins to burn after 5 minutes, reduce heat to low).
Add garlic and chili powder and cook, uncovered, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add beef and cook, breaking up meat with wooden spoon, until just pink, about 3 minutes.
Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper, brown sugar, tomato puree, ketchup, water, and hot sauce.
Simmer until Sloppy Joe sauce is slightly thicker than ketchup, 8 to 10 minutes.
Adjust seasonings.
Spoon meat mixture onto hamburger buns and serve.
Make Ahead: If you find yourself with leftover Sloppy Joes or just feel like making a double batch, the meat mixture freezes well for up to one month.
To return the meat mixture to its original consistency, you may need to add a little water when it is reheated.
4816a33066.pred:
Mix all ingredients together in a large pot.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the meat is no longer pink and the sauce is thickened.
Serve over rice or noodles.

27b86a0c47.gt:
Combine Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, anchovy paste, pepper, Worcestershire sauce, egg yolk, and minced garlic in a mini food processor; process 15 seconds.
With the processor on, gradually add olive oil, processing until combined.
Toss with romaine lettuce.
27b86a0c47.pred:
Mix all ingredients together in a small bowl.
Cover and shake well.

842d3c7eb8.gt:
Combine and mix all of the ingredients together in a bowl.
Mix the egg whites in a cutting motion.
Strain the mixture through a sieve and cook the tamagoyaki in a tamagoyaki pan.
Once cooled, cut into long strips.
842d3c7eb8.pred:
In a sushi bar, the chefs have to prepare a variety of dishes, including tamagoyaki omelettes. Tamagoyaki is a Japanese rolled omelette made with eggs, sugar, and soy sauce.
To prepare a perfect tamagoyaki omelette for sushi hand rolls, chefs should follow the following key steps:
1.
Preheat the pan over medium heat.
2.
Add a little oil to the pan and swirl to coat the pan.
3.
Pour the eggs into the pan and stir with a wooden spatula.
4.
When the eggs start to set, add the sugar and soy sauce and continue stirring.
5.
Once the eggs are completely cooked, remove the pan from the heat.
6.
Cut the tamagoyaki into 1-inch wide strips.
7.
Place a strip of tamagoyaki on a sheet of nori (seaweed).
8.
Roll the tamagoyaki up with the nori and sushi mat.
9.
Repeat steps 6 through 8 until all the tamagoyaki is rolled.
10.
Cut the rolls into 1-inch pieces.
11.
Serve the tamagoyaki rolls with sushi rice and other sushi ingredients.

131faa12b8.gt:
Stir together 1 cup yogurt, 2 tablespoons oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, salt and spices.
Add chicken and turn until well coated.
Marinate at room temperature for 20 minutes.
While the chicken is marinating, preheat grill.
While grill is heating, stir together remaining 1 1/4 cups yogurt and 1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice and salt to taste.
Reduce grill to moderate heat.
Grill chicken (discard marinade), on lightly oiled grill rack, turning occasionally (closing grill between turns), until cooked through, 10 to 12 minutes total.
Transfer chicken to a platter.
Toss together mint, shallot and remaining oil in a small bowl.
Drizzle chicken with yogurt sauce and top with mint salad.
131faa12b8.pred:
Grilled Chicken Breasts, Spiced Yogurt, and a few other ingredients.
The cooking process should be easy to follow, and the dish should be delicious.
The dish is best served with rice and a salad.
The grilled chicken breasts should be juicy and tender.
The spiced yogurt should be creamy and flavorful.
The rice should be fluffy and fragrant.
The salad should be crisp and refreshing.
The dish should be well-balanced and satisfying.
The cooking time should be moderate.
The dish should be easy to make.
The dish should be free of allergens.
The dish should be vegetarian.
The dish should be vegan.
The dish should be gluten-free.
The dish should be low in fat.
The dish should be high in protein.
The dish should be low in sodium.
The dish should be easy to clean up.

fd5fe058a6.gt:
Heat oil in skillet.
Add garlic and shallots saute until tender.
Add wine and oregano.
Simmer 4 minutes.
Add clams and heat just until they open.
Discard any that do not open.
fd5fe058a6.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large skillet, saute clams in olive oil until they open.
Remove clams from skillet and set aside.
In the same skillet, add shallots and cook until softened.
Add white wine and cook until reduced by half.
Add clams and their juices, and simmer for 3 minutes.
Add heavy cream and simmer until thickened.
Season with salt and pepper.
Pour sauce over clams and serve.
Essential ingredients: clams, olive oil, shallots, white wine, heavy cream, salt, pepper.

0b797c29a0.gt:
Reserve 1 tablespoon of olive oil,now heat the remainder in a medium saucepan
Add the garlic and a pinch.of salt and over low heat.stirring until golden brown.then remove the pan from the heat.do not let the garlic burn as it will taint its flavor.if its burn you will have to start over.
Meanwhile, bring a large saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil.add the spaghetti and remaining olive oil and cook for 10 to 12 minutes, until tender.
Drain the spaghetti thoroughly and return to the pan.
Add the oil and garlic mixture to the spaghetti and toss to coat.season with pepper,add the chopped fresh parsley, and toss to coat.
Put on a plater and serve warm, serve immediately.
0b797c29a0.pred:
1.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
2.
Cook spaghetti in boiling water until al dente.
Drain and set aside.
3.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
4.
Add tomatoes and cook until tomatoes are soft and sauce is thickened.
5.
Add spaghetti and toss to coat with sauce.
6.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and serve.

56045e7740.gt:
Heat gas grill on medium or charcoal grill until coals are ash white.
Thread meat, pineapple, red bell pepper and onion alternately onto skewers.
Combine butter, hoisin sauce and orange zest in bowl; stir until well mixed.
Spread about 1/3 mixture onto 1 side of each skewer.
Place skewers onto grill, glaze-side up.
Grill 2-4 minutes or until browned.
Turn skewers; brush grilled side with about 1/3 glaze.
Continue grilling, turning often and brushing with glaze, 8-12 minutes or until meat reaches desired doneness.

fda9c36818.gt:
Put all of the ingredients in a jar for the dressing and shake to mix throughly.
That's all.
It keeps up to 1 week.
Thinly cut daikon radish into match sticks.
Add sliced onions.
Wakame seaweed.
Pour the dressing over the salad.
Daikon radish & carrot with crispy boiled and chirimen jako salad.The combination is great.
I found this salad dressing container at a 100 yen shop.
Perfect for storing liquids!
Cheap and convenient!
Just put all the ingredients to shake it up.
fda9c36818.pred:
Put the ingredients into a bowl and mix well.
Refrigerate until ready to use.

1d309c893f.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken, soup, cheese, milk, salt, pepper and butter.
Mix together and pour mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 5 to 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly, and casserole is hot in the center.
1d309c893f.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned on both sides.
Remove chicken from pan and set aside.
Add onions, carrots, celery, and garlic to pan and cook until softened.
Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Add chicken back to pan and simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Add potatoes and cook until tender.
Season with salt and pepper.
Transfer to a 9x13 baking dish and bake for 30 minutes.
Serve with rice.

1e5cac3aa5.gt:
Arrange tomato slices on a serving platter.
Lay 1 avocado slice on top of each tomato, and top with fresh mozzarella.
Drizzle olive oil, then balsamic vinegar over the tops, and season with salt and pepper.
1e5cac3aa5.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Wash and dry the lettuce.
Cut the tomatoes into wedges.
Cut the cucumbers into slices.
Cut the cheese into cubes.
Place the lettuce on a serving platter.
Arrange the tomato wedges on top of the lettuce.
Arrange the cucumber slices on top of the tomatoes.
Sprinkle the cheese cubes on top of the cucumbers.
Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

3e392f1d33.gt:
Melt chocolate in oil (microwave), and add the rest in the order shown making sure that the eggs don't cook in the warmed oil/chocolate.
Before adding the flour, mix the salt and baking powder into the flour - then mix the flour mixture into the batter.
Pour the completed mixture into a greased and floured 9 inch x 13 inch cake pan.
Sprinkle some chopped nuts on top if desired.
Bake at 350F (180C) for 30 minutes.
Let cool at least 15 minutes.
3e392f1d33.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Melt chocolate and butter in a large bowl over a double boiler.
Add sugar and eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Stir in flour, cocoa, and salt.
Spread batter in a greased 9x13-inch pan.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool completely before cutting into squares.

0e781ad046.gt:
Roast a whole butternut pumpkin.
When soft, scoop out the flesh and mash or process before adding a teaspoon of ground cumin, crunchy peanut butter and a splash of chilli sauce to taste.
Add a drizzle of olive oil, and stir well.
Serve in a bowl with crackers or pita bread.
0e781ad046.pred:
Roast pumpkin, cream cheese, sour cream, onion, garlic, salt, pepper, and cinnamon.
In a food processor, blend all ingredients until smooth.
Chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.

6970e8f99b.gt:
Preheat oven to 300F and grease an 8x8 baking pan.
Combine unsweetened chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and melt over medium low heat, stirring constantly until pieces are almost melted.
Remove from the heat and stir until smooth.
In a large bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed, beat eggs until light yellow in color--about 5 minutes.
Add sugar and blend on low until thoroughly combined.
Add vanilla and melted chocolate to the egg sugar mixture.
Blend on low until smooth.
Add the flour and mix thoroughly.
Pour batter into greased pan.
Smooth surface with a spatula, and sprinkle uniformly with chocolate chips.
Bake on center rack of oven for 45-55 minutes.
The batter should be set and a toothpick inserted into the center should come out clean.
Do not overbake.
Cool to room temperature.
Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour.
Cut and serve chilled.
6970e8f99b.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Melt chocolate and butter in a double boiler.
Add sugar and eggs and mix well.
Stir in flour, cocoa, and salt.
Pour into a greased 9x13 inch pan.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes.
Cool completely before cutting into squares.

65e738299c.gt:
Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a large, heavy pot.
Saute the onion for a couple of minutes until softened but not browned.
Add the rice and saute for a minute or two until it turns slightly translucent.
Add the wine and stir until absorbed.
Next, add the broth one ladle at a time, stirring very frequently.
When the rice begins to dry out, add another ladle.
After about 15 minutes, begin to check the grains.
When the rice begins to break down but is still slightly tough inside, add the vegetables, basil, salt and pepper.
Add the last few ladles of veggie broth and work in the vegetables.
If youve run out of broth, use water and add salt, if needed.
Within 5 to 10 minutes, the rice will become tender and creamy.
Once the mix is thick and starchy, take it off of the heat and stir in the cheese.
Garnish with a bit more basil and more cheese, if desired.
65e738299c.pred:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large pot, saute the onions, garlic, and peppers in olive oil until soft.
Add the rice and saute for a few minutes.
Add the white wine and cook until the liquid has been absorbed.
Add the stock, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Continue to cook until the rice is tender and all of the liquid has been absorbed.
Add the tomatoes and basil and cook for a few minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Transfer the risotto to a baking dish and bake for 10 minutes.
Serve hot.

496db791a3.gt:
In a bowl, stir together the strawberries, sugar, orange juice, and Grand Marnier.
Set aside for 30 minutes to macerate.
Position a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, sift together the flour, cocoa, and baking powder.
Whisk in the sugar and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the egg, cream, butter, and vanilla.
Stir the cream mixture into the flour mixture.
Using a tablespoon, drop 6 to 8 shortcakes onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing the mounds evenly (the shortcakes will expand slightly as they bake).
Bake the shortcakes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 15 to 18 minutes.
Transfer to a rack and let cool.
To whip the cream: In the bowl of a mixer fitted with the whip attachment, on medium-high speed, beat the cream, sugar, and vanilla to medium-stiff peaks.
Do not overbeat.
To serve, split the shortcakes horizontally.
Top the bottom half with a big spoonful of strawberries (including some of the juices) and a big dollop of whipped cream.
Top with the top layer of shortcake, and spoon some berries over the top.
Top with more whipped cream, drizzle with some of the juices, and serve.
496db791a3.pred:
Chocolate Strawberry Shortcakes: 1.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
2.
In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3.
Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4.
Add milk, egg, and vanilla.
5.
Mix until dough forms a ball.
6.
Turn dough out onto a floured surface and knead until smooth.
7.
Pat dough into a 1-inch-thick round.
8.
Cut into 6 equal pieces.
9.
Place 1 piece of dough on a greased baking sheet.
10.
Press dough into a 4-inch circle.
11.
Spread with preserves.
12.
Top with remaining dough, pressing gently to seal.
13.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until golden brown.
14.
Cool on a wire rack.
15.
Serve warm or at room temperature.

56c2b059eb.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In four small cast iron skillets or one medium skillet, crumble half the cookie dough into small pieces, spreading in an even layer over bottom of skillet(s).
Drizzle hot fudge sauce over cookie dough.
Crumble remaining cookie dough on top of hot fudge, making sure to spread in an even layer.
Bake for 1820 minutes, or until top is golden brown and set.
Remove skillet(s) from oven and allow to cool slightly.
Serve with vanilla ice cream and extra hot fudge sauce, if desired.
Enjoy!
56c2b059eb.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine butter, sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla.
Stir in flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt.
Spread dough into a 9x13-inch baking pan.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven and sprinkle with chocolate chips.
Return to oven and bake for 5 minutes more.
Cool completely.
Cut into squares.

e6bf3951b6.gt:
Cook meat and onion and green pepper until meat is browned and vegetables under tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients and cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove Bay leaf when finished.
e6bf3951b6.pred:
Mix all ingredients together in a large pot.
Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add the onions and saute until translucent.
Add the garlic and saute for 1 minute.
Add the ground beef and cook until browned.
Add the chili powder, cumin, and salt.
Stir well and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, beans, and chicken broth.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 1 hour.
Add the corn and peppers and simmer for 30 minutes.
Serve with shredded cheese, sour cream, and tortilla chips.

e2b5a77d87.gt:
Heat oil in pan on low to medium heat, then throw in onion and sugar.
Cook for a couple of minutes, stirring from time to time.
Throw in mustard, stir to combine, and cook until onion is done to your liking, stirring as necessary.
Combine eggs, salt, pepper and cream cheese - don't worry if the cheese doesn't incorporate, it will once it's heated - and throw into pan, stirring everything together.
If mixture is too thick, add a little milk.
Add tomatoes, stirring and cooking until eggs are almost done, then add grated cheese and stir to melt and heat through.
Add extra salt & pepper if desired.
e2b5a77d87.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Scramble eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper.
Cut 1/2 of a red onion into thin slices.
Cut 1/2 of a tomato into thin slices.
Place onion and tomato slices on a baking sheet.
Bake in the oven until onions are soft and tomatoes are slightly charred, about 10 minutes.
Add scrambled eggs to the onion and tomato mixture.
Cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot.

27e3ef474d.gt:
This recipes makes about 1 quart of frozen yogurt.
Place the blackberries in the bowl of a food processor.
Process until smooth.
Strain the blackberries through a fine mesh sieve set over a large mixing bowl.
Using the back of a spoon, press the mixture against the sieve to extract all the juice.
Discard the seeds and any pulp.
Add the yogurt to the blackberry juice and stir to combine.
Add about 3/4 cup of honey and taste for sweetness.
You may need more honey depending on how sweet the blackberries are.
I used just under 1 cup.
Add vanilla if desired and blend until smooth.
Process in an ice cream maker according to manufacturers instructions.
Serve immediately if you prefer a soft serve consistency or put it into a freezer safe container and freeze until firm.
If frozen remove from the freezer about 15 minutes before serving.
Recipe adapted from Southern Living Magazine.
27e3ef474d.pred:
Place frozen blackberries in a blender.
Add yogurt.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a bowl.
Sprinkle with granola.
Serve immediately.

ec1a27fd77.gt:
In a ceramic bowl over boiling water melt the chocolate, water and butter together over a pot of boiling water.
(Bain marie method)
Pour the melted chocolate over the sugar and mix well.
Then separate the egg yolks from the egg whites.
And one by one add the yolks to the mixture mixing after each one.
Beat the egg whites until they are firm.
Then fold the egg whites into the chocolate mixture.
Once its all nicely mixed spoon into invidual ramekins.
Leave in the fridge for two hours to set.
Once set decorate your mousse.
I sprinkled powdered suger over mine just before serving and added a few slices of banana.
ec1a27fd77.pred:
Cream, chocolate, sugar, egg yolks, heavy cream, vanilla extract, and gelatin.
Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and chill in the refrigerator for 2 hours.
Serve with fresh berries and whipped cream.

f31dd42e03.gt:
Turn crock pot on high while preparing ingredients.
In crock pot, mix together both packages of bearnaise sauce mix, wine, tarragon, turmeric and garlic powder until well blended.
Add shallots, ham, red pepper, potatoes artichokes and chicken.
Stir gently.
Cover, reduce heat setting to low and cook 6 hours.
f31dd42e03.pred:
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces.
Cut up celery, onion, and green pepper.
Mix all ingredients together.
Add spices and seasonings.
Pour in chicken stock.
Simmer on low heat for 20 minutes.
Serve over rice.

8fe5441410.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Bake the yams until they are not quite done.
Remove them from the oven and allow them to cool.
Cut off the ends, peel them and cut them into approximately 1 slices.
Heat a heavy 10 skillet or pot on medium-low and melt the Earth Balance.
Add the honey, maple syrup, and barley malt syrup and stir.
Add the sliced yams to the pan, wedging them all in there.
Lift the pan (wearing pot holders), tilting it so that the sauce covers the yams.
Cook for 10 minutes, lifting and tilting occasionally.
Carefully turn the yams over.
Cook for another 10 minutes, lifting and tilting your pan again so the sauce covers the yams.
8fe5441410.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Cut yams into 1-inch chunks.
Place yams in a large pot and cover with water.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until yams are tender, about 20 minutes.
Drain yams and return to pot.
Add sugar and butter and stir until sugar is dissolved.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer until sugar is completely dissolved and yams are coated with a thick syrup, about 20 minutes.
Remove from heat and cool.
Serve warm or at room temperature.

3d9830c9de.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Combine all the ingredients except for the artichoke bottoms and the beef broth.
Divide and mound the meat mixture on the artichoke bottoms, about 4 tablespoons each.
In a well greased baking pan, place the filled artichokes, filled side up, in one layer.
Pour the broth over the whole thing.
Bake, lightly covered with foil, for 1 1/2 hours.
Uncover and bake another 10-15 minutes, until browned.
Serve hot.
3d9830c9de.pred:
Stuffed Artichokes: 1.
Clean and trim artichokes.
2.
Remove the tough outer leaves and trim the stem.
3.
Cut off the top of the artichoke and cut off the sharp tips.
4.
Cut off the bottom of the artichoke and cut off the remaining leaves.
5.
Cut the artichoke in half lengthwise.
6.
Remove the fuzzy choke from the center of the artichoke.
7.
Scoop out the fuzzy choke with a spoon.
8.
Fill the artichoke with a mixture of breadcrumbs, cheese, and spices.
9.
Close the artichoke with a toothpick.
10.
Bake in the oven at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes.
11.
Serve hot.

8b0f1ee273.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large saucepan combine broth, undrained tomatoes and orzo.
Bring to boiling.
Stir in Grilled & Ready Southwestern Chicken Strips.
Transfer mixture to a 2-quart baking dish.
Bake, covered, for 25 to 30 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Uncover and sprinkle with cheese during last 5 minutes of baking.
Let stand, covered, for 10 minutes before serving.
8b0f1ee273.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large skillet, saute chicken, onion, and garlic.
Add orzo and cook until orzo is tender.
In a bowl, mix together chicken broth, tomato sauce, zest and juice from 1 lemon, 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese, and 1/2 cup of feta cheese.
Pour mixture over orzo and chicken.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Sprinkle with remaining Parmesan cheese and bake for 5 more minutes.

96679eee56.gt:
Blend four, 1 cup sugar, 3 tbsp melted butter, and milk until smooth.
Pour into greased 1 1/2 quart baking dish.
Pour fruit on top of batter.
Sprinkle remaining sugar on top.
Dot with remaining butter.
Bake on 375 for 45 min or until golden brown on top.
NOTE: If using fresh fruit, boil fruit with 1/4 cup water and 1 tbsp sugar until water is reduced to a syrup.
96679eee56.pred:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine peaches, sugar, cornstarch, and cinnamon.
Stir until well mixed.
Pour into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, oats, brown sugar, butter, and milk.
Stir until well mixed.
Sprinkle over peaches.
Bake for 45 minutes.
Serve warm with ice cream.

46dc2bc350.gt:
Break noodles
Mix everything together.
Mix flavor packets with 1 cup oil, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup white vinegar,
Mix with other ingredients and refrigerate over night
Stir next morning allowing noodles to soften
Will ne ready to serve in afternoon or evening
46dc2bc350.pred:
1.
In a large bowl, combine broccoli florets, shredded cabbage, and grated carrots.
2.
Add in a dressing made of mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper, and a few drops of hot sauce.
3.
Mix well to coat the vegetables.
4.
Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

c99df4226f.gt:
Preheat oven to 425F.
Grease the muffin tins.
Mix, in a medium bowl, cornmeal, flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and white pepper.
Add cheese and nuts.
In another bowl, whisk the eggs.
Add milk and melted butter.
Mix the dry ingredients into the liquid mixture.
Stir until just combined.
Spoon the batter into prepared muffin tins.
Bake for ten minutes.
Let the muffins sit in the tins for a few minutes before removing.
Let cool on wire racks.
c99df4226f.pred:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F.
In a large bowl, combine cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and cheese.
In a separate bowl, mix eggs, milk, butter, and nuts.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and stir just until combined.
Spoon batter into a greased muffin tin.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Serve warm.

1fda5d9400.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease one 9x5 inch loaf pan.
Cream butter and sugar together.
Beat in eggs one at a time.
Beat smooth.
Stir in milk, vanilla, and almond flavoring.
In large bowl combine flour, baking powder, and salt.
Stir in fruit, raisins, and nuts.
Add all at once to first bowl.
Stir only to moisten.
Turn into greased 9x5x3 inch loaf pan.
Bake for 1 hour in 350 degree F (175 degree C) oven until it tests done.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Cool and wrap.
1fda5d9400.pred:
Fruit and Nut Loaf:
Preparation:
1. Prepare the fruit and nuts.
2. Prepare the batter.
3. Combine the fruit and nuts.
4. Add the batter to the fruit and nuts.
5. Bake in the oven.
6. Cool and serve.
Ingredients:
1. Apples
2. Bananas
3. Nuts (almonds, walnuts, pecans, etc.)

5. Oven

b0d84623b8.gt:
Toss the chicken cubes with taco seasoning.
In a heavy skillet with a tight fitting lid, heat the oil and add the chicken and cook, stirring, until it changes color.
Stir in rice and stir to mix.
Add salsa and water.
Bring to a boil and reduce heat to a simmer.
Cover and allow to cook about 20 minutes.
Remove from heat and allow to stand about 5 minutes before serving.
If you like, you may sprinkle with chopped cilantro.
b0d84623b8.pred:
Mix all ingredients together.
Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.

a89dfedebf.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Lightly grease cookie sheets.
In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, oil, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth.
Beat in the egg substitute, vanilla and water.
Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and nutmeg; stir into the sugar mixture.
Stir in the oats, oat bran, wheat germ, raisins and walnuts.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets.
Bake for 18 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are lightly browned.
Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.

Melt butter and cook minced onion in it.
Add rice; brown lightly.
Combine other ingredients with rice mixture and bring to boil.
Cover; reduce heat and steam until liquid is absorbed.
If rice is not done, add more water sparingly.

295fa6c307.gt:
Combine oil and garlic in a small bowl and rub the mushroom caps on all sides with the mixture.
Place caps, top side down, in a circle on an oiled baking sheet.
Season with salt and pepper.
Arrange the cheese, basil, and tomato slices alternately in a circle on top of the mushrooms.
Sprinkle with oregano, if using.
Bake at 450 until the cheese melts, about 3 minutes.
295fa6c307.pred:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees F.
Cut a large Portobello mushroom into 1/4-inch slices.
Place the mushroom slices on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Bake for 10 minutes, or until the mushrooms are tender.
Remove from oven and set aside.
Meanwhile, prepare the pizza crust according to package directions.
Roll out the dough to a 12-inch circle.
Transfer to a pizza pan.
Spread a layer of tomato sauce over the dough.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Place the mushroom slices on top of the sauce.
Bake at 450 degrees F for 10 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted.

43c305486e.gt:
Combine butter and onion in small microwave-safe dish and cook on high for three minutes or until onion is soft and then stir it to make it sure it is combined.
Beat eggs with sour cream in a small cup or bowl and then pour over onion.
Cook on high about 1 1/2 minutes, stirring several times.
Sprinkle bacon along rim of dish and cook on high for 30 seconds.

72392b90a9.gt:
Place steak in a 6" x 9" baking dish.
Combine marinade ingredients; pour over meat.
Cover with plastic; refrigerate 1/2 to 2 hours.
Combine salad ingredients in a bowl; chill until ready to serve.
Remove meat from marinade; pat dry.
Coat grill or broiler pan with cooking spray.
Heat grill on high.
Grill or broil steak 3 minutes on each side for medium-rare.
Transfer to a platter and let rest 10 minutes.
Remove onion from marinade.
Coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Cook onion over medium-high heat until tender, 5 minutes.
Move to a bowl.
Cut meat thinly.
For lettuce rolls: Layer rice, salad, soybean paste, onions and steak in the center of each lettuce leaf; roll up.
Serve 4 rolls per person.
72392b90a9.pred:
Heat grill to high.
Cut steak into 1/2 inch thick slices.
Place steak slices on a plate.
Sprinkle steak with salt and pepper.
Brush steak with olive oil.
Grill steak slices for 2 minutes on each side.
Remove steak from grill and place on a plate.
Cut each slice of steak into 1/2 inch thick strips.
Place 1 strip of steak on each leaf of lettuce.
Top with a slice of cheese.
Serve immediately.

38c1babf26.gt:
In a small bowl combine graham cracker crumbs melted butter and 2 tablespoons of sugar.
After mixing well, press into the bottom of a cheesecake pan; set aside.
In a large bowl, combine room temperature cream cheese, eggs, vanilla, whipping cream and 1 cup sugar.
Beat until smooth and creamy.
Pour batter into the cheesecake pan and cook for 35 to 40 minutes at 350F.
If you like your cheesecake with a sour cream topping, remove from the oven after cooking, then combine 1 pint of sour cream, 2 tablespoons of sugar and 1 teaspoon of vanilla.
Spoon on top of the cheesecake and cook for 10 additional minutes at 420 degrees.
If I am adding fruit to the top of the cheesecake, I do not add the sour cream topping.
For chocolate cheesecake, add a bag of melted chocolate chips to the mixture and use chocolate cookie crumbs for the crust.
The vanilla can be substituted with any flavoring extract.
It is a very flexible basic recipe that can be changed to incorporate any favorite flavor.
38c1babf26.pred:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F.
In a large bowl, mix together cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla.
Add eggs and mix well.
Add sour cream and mix until combined.
Pour into a 9-inch springform pan.
Bake for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
Turn off oven and leave cake in oven for 1 hour.
Remove from oven and let cool.
Refrigerate overnight.
In a small bowl, mix together 1 cup sugar and 1/2 cup water.
Add to cake and mix well.
Serve with fresh fruit and whipped cream.

06e92239ab.gt:
Combine all of the ingredients in a mason jar, screw on the top and shake to thoroughly mix.
Let sit for at least 20 minutes.
Keep refrigerated.
Makes about 3/4 to 1 cup of dressing.
